definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
pitch-black/(fig.) to be completely in the dark
pitch-black/(fig.) to be completely in the dark

sentences.english: It was still pitch-dark when I started off from Delamu Inn.
sentences.chinese: 早上从德拉姆客栈出发时，四周还是漆黑一团。

sentences.english: Whoso curseth his father or his mother, his lamp shall be put out in obscure darkness.
sentences.chinese: 咒骂父母的，他的灯必灭，变为漆黑的黑暗。

sentences.english: The interior of the church was dark.
sentences.chinese: 这家教堂的内部漆黑一片。

sentences.english: The pilot said that at the moment everything was blacked out for him.
sentences.chinese: 那位驾驶员说当时他眼前一片漆黑。
今天天空变得一片漆黑。

sentences.english: Write dull eyes still staring at the dark night to close the.
sentences.chinese: 写写乏味了双眼仍旧盯着漆黑的夜不肯合上。

sentences.english: I am alone and the road is very dark.
sentences.chinese: 我踽踽独行，前路一片漆黑。

sentences.english: Meteor finished with the long-tail again across the dark night sky.
sentences.chinese: 说完流星带着长长的光尾再次划过漆黑的夜空。

sentences.english: In fact, he was jet black without a spot of white.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，他通体漆黑，不杂一点儿白毛。

sentences.english: Out-side the litter night had fallen. Inside all was dark.
sentences.chinese: 轿外夜幕已经降临，轿内也已经一片漆黑。

sentences.english: He glanced at his watch again, then stared toward the blackened windows.
sentences.chinese: 他又朝他的手表看去，然后望向那漆黑的窗户。

sentences.english: The horses nickered in the darkness beyond the fire's circle of light.
sentences.chinese: 火照得到的一圈外，一片漆黑，马嘶叫了几声。

sentences.english: The sky is still black. The world is still asleep.
sentences.chinese: 天空仍漆黑一片，整个世界还在沉睡。

sentences.english: It was a dark evening. The wind was blowing hard.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个漆黑的夜晚，风刮得正紧。

sentences.english: So, it was sit at the bottom of a pitch-black well all evening, or…
sentences.chinese: 那么，或者是他整个晚上就坐在这漆黑的井底，或者。

sentences.english: Rain began to pour down from a black and comfortless sky.
sentences.chinese: 瓢泼的雨水开始从漆黑不安的天上落下来。

definition: pitch-black/(fig.) to be completely in the dark
pitch-black/(fig.) to be completely in the dark

pinyin: shen1 shou3 bu4 jian4 wu3 zhi3

definition: light/beam of light/gleam of light/light reflected from an object
variant of 黑糊糊[hei1 hu1 hu1]
